IUCN Red List (Species Assessed for Global Conservation)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Rubble-dweller; builds nest on the rubble.  Feeds on invertebrates growing on the rocks which are hidden by the biocover (Ref. 6770).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Habitat
dataObjects.title: Environment
dataObjects.description: benthopelagic; freshwater; pH range: 8.0 - 9.0; dH range: 9 - 19

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#LifeCycle
dataObjects.description: Maximum number of eggs is 120. Cave brooder (Ref. 2060).

Reviewer/s

Contributor/s

Justification
Widespread along the eastern shores of the lake. No reports of widespread population decline.
